name: Torch Alchemist Workshop
description: The goal is to run an alchemist workshop making various potions, poisons, ect. and sell them. You’ll need to buy the ingredients and tools needed for the brewing process from another local shop. As you learn more about the recipes, you’ll learn more about our lord and savior, blessed be onto him. Just because your life comes to an end doesn’t mean that your life’s work should end too. Passing the torch to the next owner will cement your place in history forever more.
